creator: Scripbox - Invest in Mutual Funds
descriptionHtml:
Scripbox makes it super easy to invest in the best mutual funds that can help you achieve your financial goals in life. Invest in mutual funds using Scripbox app which is India’s trusted online investment platform. There is no lock-in for equity or debt mutual funds (except ELSS mutual funds). Get a complete view of how your mutual fund investments are growing and benefit from Scripbox’s periodic reviews of mutual funds to ensure that you stay invested in the best mutual funds at all times.

Get started with a monthly SIP (Systematic Investment Plan) or a One-Time Investment in algorithmically selected top mutual funds of 2020.

Pay securely using net banking or UPI.

Investing in the best mutual funds made simple & easy


- Algorithmically selected mutual funds
- Zero fees. No transaction charges
- 100% paperless KYC process
- Invest easily with SIPs or lumpsum investment amounts
- Calculators: Smart personal finance calculators
- Tracking: Live investment performance dashboard on the app
- Save tax: Tax optimized withdrawal recommendations
- Learn from experts: Expert tips about mutual funds and investments
- Create personalized financial investment plans
- Security: 100% bank-grade security

Learn more about how to invest in mutual funds


- Blog articles by experts
- Best investment practices
- Personal finance Q&A
- Wealth management tips
- Benefits of SIP mutual funds

Start an SIP(Systematic Investment Plan) with just Rs 5,000 per month


- Lower impact of market volatility
- Setup auto-debit from bank account
- Flexible SIPs - Pause or stop anytime
- Suitable for long term plans like retirement or child’s education
- Personalized mutual funds investment plans based on goals
- Pay securely using net banking or UPI
- 100% bank-grade security

Build wealth for long-term goals


- Retirement Planning
- Child’s Education
- Beat inflation
- Top equity mutual funds of 2020
- Grow your money and build wealth in the long-term
- Personalized financial plans
- Lower tax rates after 1 year
- Complete your investments with simple steps

Save smartly for short-term goals
- Vacation or Wedding or Dream car purchase
- Down payment or Emergencies related to health or job loss
- Top debt mutual funds of 2020
- Better returns than FD or PPF
- Lower tax rates after 3 years
- Lower volatility with SIP in mutual funds
- Complete your investments with simple steps

Smart way to save tax for the year 2019
- Top ELSS mutual funds
- Save up to Rs 46,500 under Section 80C
- SIP investment starting Rs 1000 per month
- Double Benefit: Grow your money & save tax
- Lowest lock-in of just 3 years compared to PPF, NSC, Insurance or FD
- Instant, downloadable investment proof

Our mutual funds partners
- HDFC Mutual Fund
- Mirae Asset Mutual Fund
- Kotak Mutual Fund
- PPFAS Mutual Fund
- DSP Blackrock Mutual Fund
- Tata Mutual Fund
- ICICI Prudential Mutual Fund
- Motilal Oswal Mutual Funds
- L&T Mutual Fund
- Franklin Templeton Mutual Fund
- Axis Mutual Fund
- SBI Mutual Fund
- And more..

Talk to our experts
- Dial 1800-102-1265
- 7 Days in a Week
- 8 AM to 8 PM

Invest in mutual funds securely
- Bank-grade security
- Annual review of mutual funds
- Flexible SIPs - Pause or stop anytime
- SEBI registered

Scripbox’s Journey
- 7 Years, founded in 2012
- 4 Mn+ mutual funds transactions
- 1,250+ cities
- Rs 1,500+ cr AUM across mutual funds

Scripbox in the News
- Best Fin-tech - Best Banks Award by Financial Express
- Voted 2nd Most Influential Financial Services brand worldwide by LinkedIn

Achieve your life goals with Scripbox mutual funds app! Join the thriving community of mutual funds investors from across India.

* Mutual Fund investments are subject to market risks, read all scheme related documents on mutual funds carefully. Past performance of mutual funds is not an indicator of future returns.
descriptionShort: Invest in the top mutual funds to grow wealth or save tax. Paperless. Secure.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Your Scripbox experience just went up a notch with this update.

- Introducing Reinvest in Tax Saver Plan
- Annual Portfolio Update 2020 is now live. Get the latest portfolio of funds for 2020.
- Tax & exit load optimisation algorithm for withdrawals

- New feature - Scripbox Smart Transfer Plan
- Revamped Portfolio Scan experience to fine tune your investments

title: Invest in Mutual Funds, SIPs & US Stocks: Scripbox

creator: Scripbox - Invest in Mutual Funds
descriptionHtml:
Scripbox has been India's trusted online wealth management and mutual fund investment platform since 2012, managing 3700+ crores worth assets and has successfully helped 6400+ customers become millionaires. It offers mutual funds investments, SIPs, India and US stock investments, portfolios & more..

Human bias? Investment tracking? Do these bother you during financial planning?

Scripbox provides world-class wealth management using science, data and technology, leveraged by our experience, and human touch.

Scripbox’s wealth management helps you invest in mutual funds, SIP, and to buy US stocks from India, also, assists you to track your financial portfolio by consolidating all your investments from various platforms.

Invest with Scripbox?
Mutual funds, SIPs, & US stocks investments are simplified and automated with just a click away.

Switch to goal-based investing with Scripbox’s custom made investment portfolio curated using the proprietary algorithm. The algorithm leverages the power of science and the collective investing experience of the team.

Scripbox’s goal-based investing plans:

Retire Confident
Tax saver
Child Education
Emergency Fund
Dream Investment Planner

Indian Equities: Link your Zerodha account to transact & track your Indian stock investments through the Scripbox dashboard.

Buy US Equities: Invest in US stocks via Stockal.

How to Manage Portfolio with Scripbox?
You don’t even have to ask; we’ve got your back.

Investment Tracker: Upload your mutual fund CAS & NSDL CAS; link your Zerodha account; add your FD and real estate investments to track your portfolio online with Scripbox.

Scripbox Annual ReviewTM: The algorithm tracks the progress of your goal by reviewing the previous year mutual fund recommendations and proposing new funds if needed.

Scripbox Portfolio ScanTM: Thrice a year, the algorithm identifies underperforming funds and, if needed, declutters your portfolio. It proposes portfolio management & rebalancing through fund recommendations to ensure you stay invested in the right funds.

In addition to portfolio tracking, Scripbox gives alerts for all critical wealth events and offers multi dimensional wealth analysis. Also, dynamically engages you with its advisory and rich content.

Manage Withdrawals with Scripbox
When you are investing, always have an exit plan. Scripbox Smart Withdraw™ tracks the impact of capital gains on your taxes and proposes a tax optimized exit plan.

Convenience with Scripbox

✅100% paperless KYC process
✅Zero fees. No transaction charges
✅Easy Investing: Top SIP plans or lumpsum investment
✅Pay securely with net banking or UPI
✅Auto-debit from Bank account
✅Flexible SIP Investment: Pause or stop anytime
✅Double Benefit: Grow your money & save tax by investing in top ELSS mutual funds
✅Secure Investing: 100% bank-grade security
✅Simple Dashboard: Find everything you need in one place
✅Annual review of mutual funds

Calculators: Mutual Fund Calculator, SIP Calculator, Income Tax Calculator, Retirement Planner Calculator, ELSS Calculator & other Smart Personal Finance Calculators. Use Scipbox's Financial Health Calculator to measure your score and incorporate the recommendations to improve it.

Invest with Scripbox?

When you are investing, always have an exit plan. Scripbox Smart Withdraw™ tracks the impact of capital gains on your taxes and proposes a tax optimized exit plan.

title: Mutual Funds & SIP: Scripbox

creator: Scripbox - Invest in Mutual Funds
descriptionHtml:
Scripbox has been India's trusted online wealth management and mutual fund investment platform since 2012, managing 3700+ crores worth assets and has successfully helped 6400+ customers become millionaires. It offers mutual funds investments, SIPs, India and US stock investments, portfolios & more..

Human bias? Investment tracking? Do these bother you during financial planning?

Scripbox provides world-class wealth management using science, data and technology, leveraged by our experience, and human touch.

Scripbox’s wealth management helps you invest in mutual funds, SIP, and to buy US stocks from India, also, assists you to track your financial portfolio by consolidating all your investments from various platforms.

Invest with Scripbox?
Mutual funds, SIPs, & US stocks investments are simplified and automated with just a click away.

Switch to goal-based investing with Scripbox’s custom made investment portfolio curated using the proprietary algorithm. The algorithm leverages the power of science and the collective investing experience of the team.

Scripbox’s goal-based investing plans:

Retire Confident
Tax saver
Child Education
Emergency Fund
Dream Investment Planner

Indian Equities: Link your Zerodha account to transact & track your Indian stock investments through the Scripbox dashboard.

Buy US Equities: Invest in US stocks via Stockal.

How to Manage Portfolio with Scripbox?
You don’t even have to ask; we’ve got your back.

Investment Tracker: Upload your mutual fund CAS & NSDL CAS; link your Zerodha account; add your FD and real estate investments to track your portfolio online with Scripbox.

Scripbox Annual ReviewTM: The algorithm tracks the progress of your goal by reviewing the previous year mutual fund recommendations and proposing new funds if needed.

Scripbox Portfolio ScanTM: Thrice a year, the algorithm identifies underperforming funds and, if needed, declutters your portfolio. It proposes portfolio management & rebalancing through fund recommendations to ensure you stay invested in the right funds.

In addition to portfolio tracking, Scripbox gives alerts for all critical wealth events and offers multi dimensional wealth analysis. Also, dynamically engages you with its advisory and rich content.

Manage Withdrawals with Scripbox
When you are investing, always have an exit plan. Scripbox Smart Withdraw™ tracks the impact of capital gains on your taxes and proposes a tax optimized exit plan.

Convenience with Scripbox

✅100% paperless KYC process
✅Zero fees. No transaction charges
✅Easy Investing: Top SIP plans or lumpsum investment
✅Pay securely with net banking or UPI
✅Auto-debit from Bank account
✅Flexible SIP Investment: Pause or stop anytime
✅Double Benefit: Grow your money & save tax by investing in top ELSS mutual funds
✅Secure Investing: 100% bank-grade security
✅Simple Dashboard: Find everything you need in one place
✅Annual review of mutual funds

Human bias? Investment tracking? Do these bother you during financial planning?

Invest with Scripbox?
Mutual funds, SIPs, & US stocks investments are simplified and automated with just a click away.

Switch to goal-based investing with Scripbox’s custom made investment portfolio curated using the proprietary algorithm. The algorithm leverages the power of science and the collective investing experience of the team.

Dream Investment Planner

Indian Equities: Link your Zerodha account to transact & track your Indian stock investments through the Scripbox dashboard.

Buy US Equities: Invest in US stocks via Stockal.

How to Manage Portfolio with Scripbox?
You don’t even have to ask; we’ve got your back.

Investment Tracker: Upload your mutual fund CAS & NSDL CAS; link your Zerodha account; add your FD and real estate investments to track your portfolio online with Scripbox.

Scripbox Annual ReviewTM: The algorithm tracks the progress of your goal by reviewing the previous year mutual fund recommendations and proposing new funds if needed.

In addition to portfolio tracking, Scripbox gives alerts for all critical wealth events and offers multi dimensional wealth analysis. Also, dynamically engages you with its advisory and rich content.

Manage Withdrawals with Scripbox
When you are investing, always have an exit plan. Scripbox Smart Withdraw™ tracks the impact of capital gains on your taxes and proposes a tax optimized exit plan.

title: Scripbox: Mutual Fund & SIP

creator: Scripbox - Invest in Mutual Funds
descriptionHtml:
Scripbox helps you select the right funds algorithmically based on your short term or long term financial goals. It’s easy to use interface provides you with a quick way to invest in the best mutual funds using India’s trusted online investment platform. Scripbox can prove to be an essential tool for your financial planning and investment goals.Get a complete view of how your investments are growing and keep track of your financial growth through scripbox

Get started today using a monthly SIP (Systematic Investment Plan) or a One-Time Investment and benefit from Scripbox’s periodic reviews which ensure that you have the best mutual fund investments at all times. Pay securely using net banking or UPI.

Why Should You Invest With Scripbox?
✅ Algorithmically selected mutual funds
✅ Zero fees. No transaction charges
✅ 100% paperless KYC process
✅ Invest easily with SIPs or lumpsum investment amounts
✅ Calculators: Smart personal finance calculators
✅ Tracking: Live investment performance dashboard on the app
✅ Save tax: Tax optimized withdrawal recommendations
✅ Learn from experts: Expert tips about mutual funds and investments
✅ Create personalized financial investment plans
✅ Security: 100% bank-grade security
✅ Simple Dashboard: Find everything you need at one place and avoid unnecessary clutters of data.

Financial Goal Based Investment
📍 Vacation, Wedding or Dream Car purchase
📍 Down payment or Emergencies due to sudden Health/Job loss
📍 Retirement Planning
📍 Children’s Education
📍 Top Equity or Debt Mutual Funds
📍 Better Returns than FD or PPF
📍 Lower Tax Rates after 1 to 3 years
📍 Lower volatility with SIP in mutual funds


Start with just Rs 5,000 per month
- Manage Market Volatility better
- Auto-debit from Bank account
- Flexible SIPs - Pause or stop anytime
- Personalized mutual funds investment plans based on goals
- No lock-in for equity or debt mutual funds (except ELSS mutual funds)
- Pay securely using net banking or UPI
- 100% bank-grade security

Smart Tax-Saving for 2021
- Top ELSS mutual funds
- Save up to Rs 46,500 under Section 80C
- SIP investment starting Rs 1,000 per month
- Double Benefit: Grow your money & Save tax
- Lowest lock-in of just 3 years compared to PPF, NSC, Insurance or FD
- Instant, downloadable investment proof

Learn About Investing
- Expert Blog Articles

- And more..

-📞Dial 1800-102-1265
- 📅 7 Days in a Week

Secure Mutual Fund Investments
- Bank-grade security
- Annual review of mutual funds

- 8 Years, founded in 2012
- 6.5 Mn+ mutual funds transactions
- 2,440+ cities

Invest with Scripbox?

Dream Investment Planner

How to Manage Portfolio with Scripbox?
You don’t even have to ask; we’ve got your back.

Investment Tracker: Upload your mutual fund CAS & NSDL CAS; link your Zerodha account; add your FD and real estate investments to track your portfolio online with Scripbox.

title: Scripbox: Mutual Fund & SIP

creator: Scripbox - Invest in Mutual Funds
descriptionHtml:
Scripbox has been India's trusted digital wealth manager since 2012, managing ₹13,500 crores worth assets and has successfully helped 50,000+ families achieve their goals.

As your personal digital wealth manager, Scripbox offers not just mutual funds investments & SIPs but also gives personalised recommendations on the basis of Scripbox Fund Ranking Algorithm™ coupled with our research team’s years of expertise to help you choose the right funds. To protect your MF portfolio from market fluctuations, we also provide recommendations on the right asset allocation & diversification. With Scripbox you also get access to tools such as SIP MF Calculator & SIP Tracker.

To ensure that you stay invested in the right funds we perform quarterly reviews using Scripbox Portfolio Health & suggest timely course corrections. And finally to make sure you don’t lose your gains to capital gains tax & exit loads we recommend the right ways to exit your investments with Scripbox Smart Withdraw ™


WHAT WE OFFER:

1️⃣FAMILY PORTFOLIOS with multiple family member accounts to help you plan finances and goals together.

2️⃣GROWTH STRATEGIES that recommend an asset allocation as per your risk profile and also provide recommendations to build a portfolio that is ideal for you.

3️⃣PORTFOLIO REVIEWS to assess your investments across 9 parameters every quarter.

4️⃣ACTIONS & RECOMMENDATIONS ON THE APP so you never miss investments, portfolio reviews, or anything your wealth needs.

5️⃣ALL YOUR WEALTH MANAGEMENT NEEDS IN ONE PLACE through tracking even your external investments in the app. You can tag your existing external investments to your plan and get personalised recommendations.

6️⃣TAX-OPTIMISED WITHDRAWAL using the Scripbox Smart Withdraw™ algorithm helps you minimise losses to capital gains tax and exit loads.

SCRIPBOX GOAL-BASED INVESTING PLANS

title: Invest in MF & SIP: Scripbox

creator: Scripbox - Invest in Mutual Funds
descriptionHtml:
Scripbox has been India's trusted digital wealth manager since 2012, managing ₹15,000 crores worth assets and has successfully helped 50,000+ families invest in mutual fund and achieve their goals.

As your personal digital wealth manager, Scripbox offers not just investment in mutual fund and SIP but also gives personalised mutual fund recommendations on the basis of Scripbox Fund Ranking Algorithm™ coupled with our research team’s years of expertise to help you choose the right mutual fund for your risk profile and needs. To protect your mutual fund portfolio from market fluctuations, we also provide recommendations on the right asset allocation & diversification for your mutual fund portfolio. With Scripbox you also get access to tools such as SIP Mutual Fund Calculator & SIP Tracker. You can also start saving tax by investing in top ELSS tax saving mutual fund.

To ensure that you continue to invest in the right mutual fund, we perform quarterly reviews using Scripbox Portfolio Health & suggest timely course corrections. And finally to make sure you don’t lose your gains to capital gains tax & exit loads we recommend the right ways to exit your investment with Scripbox Smart Withdraw™.


WHAT WE OFFER:

1️⃣FAMILY PORTFOLIOS with multiple family member accounts to help you plan investment and goals together.

2️⃣GROWTH STRATEGIES that recommend an asset allocation for your mutual fund portfolio as per your risk profile and also provide recommendations to build a portfolio that is ideal for you.

3️⃣PORTFOLIO REVIEWS to assess your mutual fund investment across 9 parameters every quarter.

4️⃣ACTIONS & RECOMMENDATIONS so you never miss your investment, SIP, portfolio reviews, or anything else your wealth needs.

5️⃣TRACK ALL YOUR WEALTH IN ONE PLACE, even your external investments in the app. You can tag your existing external investments to any plan and get personalised recommendations.

6️⃣TAX-OPTIMISED WITHDRAWAL using the Scripbox Smart Withdraw™ algorithm, helps you minimise losses to capital gains tax and exit loads.

SCRIPBOX GOAL-BASED MUTUAL FUND INVESTING PLANS

On our wealth management platform we offer financial plans for a wide range of goals, such as:

✅Long Term Portfolio - A personalised mutual fund portfolio, diversified across equity, debt and gold for long-term growth.
✅Retire Confident - Maintain your current lifestyle, even after you stop working 9-5, with a personalised mutual fund portfolio.
✅Tax Saver - ELSS tax saving mutual fund portfolio that helps you grow wealth while saving taxes, the smart way.
✅Child Education - Give your child the best education the world has to offer, with a personalised mutual fund portfolio.
✅Emergency Fund - Be emergency ready, without having to break your FDs or affecting your long-term investments with a Liquidity first mutual fund portfolio.
✅Dream Planner - Plan for your next vacation, dream car, or your wedding, with a diversified mutual fund portfolio.
✅My First Crore - Your personalised mutual fund portfolio to help you build your First Crore, within a specified time period.

As your personal digital mutual fund app, Scripbox offers not just online mutual fund investment and systematic investment plans (SIPs) but also provides personalised investment plans through our proprietary Scripbox Fund Ranking Algorithm™. Our research team, backed by years of expertise, ensures you choose the best mutual fund portfolio that matches your risk profile and financial planning goals.

To safeguard your mutual funds portfolio from market volatility, we also offer recommendations on asset allocation and portfolio diversification. Scripbox offers essential tools like the Portfolio Review, that monitors your overall portfolio performance and shares recommended actions to be taken on your active lumpsum or SIP investments. Plus, you can start saving on taxes by investing in top ELSS funds.

WHAT WE OFFER:
